EmailTemplate.description: This is send to Staffing Associate record owner when a payroll/references follow-up call is needed
EmailTemplate.name: SF to Staffing Associate no payroll/references received
EmailTemplate.subject: {!Contact.FirstName} {!Contact.LastName} has not submitted their payroll/reference information
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Contact.OwnerFirstName},
{!Contact.FirstName} {!Contact.LastName} has not submitted their payroll information and may not have submitted details for their referees either.
Please check their Job Application and follow up with a call, as it is possible that they have not received the emails. Click on the link to view the record {!Job_Application__c.Link}.
This is a standard email, sent automatically 4 days after "Date payroll reminder 2" when "Date payroll info submitted" is empty.
